metadata.name: Magic Items Expansion Pack 1
metadata.description: Original magical items and artifacts for fairy tales

sentient_objects.text: Mirror of Selective Truth that shows only what the viewer secretly hopes to see
Teapot that brews emotions instead of tea, each flavor creating a different feeling
Quill that writes in invisible ink only the intended recipient can read
Loom that weaves dreams into physical tapestries while its user sleeps
Compass that points to what the holder has lost but forgotten about

transformative_items.text: Gloves that allow the wearer to reshape any natural material by touch
Mask that changes not the wearer's appearance but how others perceive themselves
Hourglass that ages or rejuvenates anything placed inside its glass chamber
Paintbrush that brings painted objects to life for one hour per day
Thimble that shrinks the wearer to the size of an insect when pricked

boundary_objects.text: Doorknob that can be attached to any surface, creating a door to elsewhere
Lantern that reveals hidden pathways between worlds when lit at twilight
Bridge made of moonlight that appears only to those who are truly lost
Key that unlocks forgotten memories instead of physical locks
Spectacles that allow the wearer to see into parallel realities

weather_items.text: Umbrella that creates a small localized weather system beneath it
Bellows that can capture and release winds from different seasons
Snowglobe that controls the weather in the area depicted inside it
Flute that summons specific clouds when different melodies are played
Cloak that absorbs rainfall and can release it as a concentrated deluge

time_objects.text: Pocketwatch that can pause time for everyone except the holder for one minute per day
Calendar where crossing out a day makes that day repeat
Sundial that casts shadows showing events from yesterday or tomorrow
Metronome that speeds up or slows down local time with each tick
Spinning wheel that can unravel time from objects, returning them to earlier states

musical_artifacts.text: Harp with strings made from moonbeams that plays itself when touched by starlight
Drum that beats in time with the heart of whoever the drummer thinks about
Bell that can only be heard by those who share a secret with the ringer
Violin that plays the thoughts of whoever listens to its music
Music box that creates illusions corresponding to the melody it plays

deceptive_treasures.text: Coins that always return to their owner's purse by the next sunrise
Jewel that appears as the most valuable gem to each viewer
Chest that contains exactly what was last stolen from its owner
Crown that makes subjects see the wearer as their ideal ruler
Pearl necklace where each pearl contains a captured lie told by its wearer
